column1: #Text=Actress Azula says : " The Avatar is no more ! "
#Text=Suki says : " It seems like every time there 's a big battle , you guys barely make it out alive .
#Text=" Suki says : " Are you trying to get on my bad side ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " I 'm just saying ... " Katara says : " Does anyone know where Aang is ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " He left to get me fire gummies , like , ten minutes ago .
#Text=" Katara says : " I 'm gon na check outside .
